name: GetPayrollrunInitiationvaluesByPayrollAdministrationIdAndPeriodId
description:
__Activity name :__ GetPayrollrunInitiationvaluesByPayrollAdministrationIdAndPeriodId 

Get the initiation values for initiating a payrollrun for a specific period.

Authorization.description: A valid Bearer token for authorizing the request.

Accept.description: The accept header is used to influence what type of output is returned and in most cases the version of the output

payrollrunId.description: The unique identifier of the payroll run

payrollPeriodId.description: The unique identifier of the payroll period

$ul: **version**
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
**messages**
**content**
**availableForEmployeeDate**: The date on which the pay slips will be available to employees.
**emailAddressPayrollRunApproved**: The email address to send an email to, after starting the payroll run has been approved."
**emailAddressPayrollRunFinished**: The email address to send an email to, after the payroll run has been calculated.
**emailAddressPayrollRunStarted**: The email address to send an email to, after starting the payroll run proces.
**payrollPeriod**
**periodEndDate**: The last day of the period for which the tax return message was created
**periodNumber**: The period number of the payroll period the record relates to
**periodStartDate**: The first day of the period for which the tax return message was created
**testYear**: Indicates whether the payroll periode is part of a test year.
**year**: The year of the payroll period the record relates to
**sendEmailToEmployee**: Indicates whether an email should be sent to the employees when the pay slip is available to them.
**version**
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
